snippet: On a MySpace page abandoned in 2005, George Zimmerman made remarks about Mexicans, and a lawyer for the family of Trayvon Martin says such writings may be evidence that he has profiled people based on ethnicity in the past.
abstract: On a MySpace page abandoned in 2005, George Zimmerman made remarks about Mexicans, and a lawyer for the family of Trayvon Martin says such writings may be evidence that he has profiled people based on ethnicity in the past.

headline.main: George Zimmerman's Disparaging Remarks About Mexicans on MySpace
